titleStmt.title: A true relation of some notable passages faithfully performed on the coasts of England and Ireland, by some of the ships under the command of the Right Honorable Robert Earle of VVarvvick for the service of King and Parliament. As it was certified by two letters sent to the honorable committee for the navy.
titleStmt.author: Perlunkett, Thomas.
Moulton, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Francis Leach, for Lawrance Blackelock, and are to bee [sic] sold at his shop at Temple-Barre,

notesStmt.note: reproduction of the original in the British Library.
